data.author: Desiderius Erasmus
data.quote: Whether a party can have much success without a woman present I must ask others to decide, but one thing is certain, no party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.

data.author: Joseph Wood Krutch
data.quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.

data.author: Anna Pavlova
data.quote: Success depends in a very large measure upon individual initiative and exertion, and cannot be achieved except by a dint of hard work.

data.author: Michael Korda
data.quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.

data.author: Ambrose Bierce
data.quote: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.

data.author: Tommy Lasorda
data.quote: About the only problem with success is that it does not teach you how to deal with failure.

data.author: Solomon Ortiz
data.quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.

data.author: Pauline Kael
data.quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.

data.author: Henry Samueli
data.quote: Passion is what gives meaning to our lives. It's what allows us to achieve success beyond our wildest imagination. Try to find a career path that you have a passion for.

data.author: Albert Camus
data.quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.

data.author: Nikos Kazantzakis
data.quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed.

data.author: Allen Ginsberg
data.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.

data.author: Patricia Cornwell
data.quote: In my forties, my optimism was boundless. I had really good health and tremendous success which allowed me to do anything I wanted.

data.author: Keith Henson
data.quote: Evolution acts slowly. Our psychological characteristics today are those that promoted reproductive success in the ancestral environment.

data.author: Aesop
data.quote: The level of our success is limited only by our imagination and no act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted.

data.author: Kendrick Lamar
data.quote: I look at where I'm at today and realize that most of my success is owed to the mentors that was in my life.

data.author: Malcolm X
data.quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.

data.author: Simon Cowell
data.quote: My proudest achievement has been the success of the shows and artists I have been involved with, because they were made in Britain.

data.author: Pele
data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

data.author: Noel Gallagher
data.quote: I don't dislike rappers or hip-hop or people who like it. I went to the Def Jam tour in Manchester in the '80s when rap was inspirational. Public Enemy were awesome. But it's all about status and bling now, and it doesn't say anything to me.
